content: The video is a recording of a discussion at the VR Mystery School about Chapter 7 of the book "Prometheus Rising" by Robert Anton Wilson. The participants briefly discuss the exercises from the previous session and share their experiences. They delve into the concept of the time-binding semantic circuit, which is a revolutionary strategy that seeks new equilibrium at a higher energy level, unlike the first two evolutionary stable strategies that maintain homeostasis. They also explore the idea of the westward movement of wealth throughout history, as observed by historian Brooks Adams. Additionally, the participants touch on the concept of accelerationism and the idea of a mathematical expression describing the rate of change of human societies.
